description: Setsuna`s older sister and her surrogate mother. She works full-time as a nun in the local church while Setsuna goes to the academy for classes in the day. Before Setsuna partnered Yuuka on exorcisms, Yuuka would work alone or with other exorcists dispatched by the church. She has considerably more experience with exorcisms than Setsuna and has experienced her fair share of failures as well.
name: Shindou Yuuka
